nodes.text: Night-beetles were a species of beetle native to the planet Ganthel. During the Battle of Endor, Admiral Rae Sloane of the Galactic Empire likened the firefight to night-beetles in Ganthel's outback.
Night-beetles were first mentioned in "The Levers of Power," a canon short story written by Jason Fry and published in The Rise of the Empire in 2015.
